Malvin TanLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 24 Feb 2019Hi, its possible that watches may be an investment however that is provided if you are able to buy them at a discount from its value. Value investors seeks to buy underpriced assets based on some form of fundamental analysis. You will have to determine the value of the watch compared to the price before you decide to invest. A good investment will be one that is not only bought at a discount but also generates dividend/income/interest by holding on to them. There are 4 fundamental financial assets that give you these and they are bonds, loans, deposits and stocks.0 comments0

Zann ChuaLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 23 Feb 2019Hello! The good thing about investing in luxury watches would be that ut has a low correlation to other financial markets such as bonds and stocks. The value of your watch will not be directly affected should there be a stock market crash. It would likely be a good invesment if you are able to purchase the watch below the retail price. It is also important that you know a good channel for resale where the such as if you know of any passionate watch collectors. If the watch was previously worn by a celebrity it would also be a good investment. Hope this helps!0 comments0
